<Text: The Profile House was a grand hotel in the White Mountains of New Hampshire, in the United States.>
Triplets:<The Profile House
1:
--------------------
<Text: Profile House:  Originally built in 1852 and opening for its first season in 1853, it was operated by several owners and partners until its final season under the ownership of Karl P. Abbott, when the hotel, at its seasonal peak, burned to the ground, leaving only the train depot standing in the fire's aftermath.>
